home.name: Yosra Mohsen
home.tagline:
I Design the Dream.
I Build the Reality
home.description: I've always been obsessed with how things work under the hood. To me, a great app is a story that starts with a pixel and ends with a solid line of code. I bridge the gap between "how it looks" and "how it performs," making sure every user journey is a masterpiece.

ui_ux.title: UI/UX Design
ui_ux.subtitle: Crafting Intuitive User Experiences
ui_ux.description: Explore my design portfolio showcasing user-centered design solutions.

flutter_dev.title: Flutter Development
flutter_dev.subtitle: Building Cross-Platform Applications
flutter_dev.description: Discover my Flutter projects and mobile development expertise.

about.title: About Me
about.role: Product Designer & UI/UX Specialist | Flutter Developer
about.description: The Architect of Experience. With 3 years in UI/UX and 5 years in Graphic Design, I don't just "draw" apps—I engineer them. Now, as a Flutter Developer, I bring those designs to life, ensuring the soul of the creative vision survives every line of code. I bridge the gap between "what's beautiful" and "what actually works."

zimitail.title: UI/UX Designer — Zimitail
zimitail.description: At Zimitail, I led the entire design journey, turning complex user research into seamless, high-fidelity realities.

smartly.title: UI/UX Designer — Smartly Techs
smartly.description: Simplifying the Complex. I mastered the art of information architecture, making sure every user interaction felt natural and intuitive.

freelance.title: Graphic & UI Designer — Freelance
freelance.description: "Developed a high-performance electronics marketplace using Flutter and MVVM architecture. Integrated professional GitHub version control and clean code practices to deliver a scalable, feature-rich shopping experience."

flutter_exp.title: One Year Experience
flutter_exp.description: I took the leap from pixels to production, building robust Flutter apps with Clean Architecture and a designer’s eye for detail.

soft_skills.title: Soft Skills
soft_skills.description: Strong communication, problem-solving, attention to detail, teamwork, and adaptability.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Every pixel matters. I strive for excellence in every detail.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Great work comes from great teamwork and communication.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Always exploring new technologies and design trends.
